columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified identifier of the resource.

columns.name: namespace
columns.description: Gets or sets namespace of the resource.

columns.name: visibility
columns.description: The visibility of the configuration. The default value is 'Custom'. Possible values include: 'VisibilityCustom', 'VisibilityPublic'.

columns.name: maintenance_scope
columns.description: The maintenanceScope of the configuration. Possible values include: 'ScopeHost', 'ScopeOSImage', 'ScopeExtension', 'ScopeInGuestPatch', 'ScopeSQLDB', 'ScopeSQLManagedInstance'.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The identity that created the resource.

columns.name: created_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that created the resource. Possible values include: 'CreatedByTypeUser', 'CreatedByTypeApplication', 'CreatedByTypeManagedIdentity', 'CreatedByTypeKey'.

columns.name: last_modified_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).

columns.name: last_modified_by
columns.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: last_modified_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource. Possible values include: 'CreatedByTypeUser', 'CreatedByTypeApplication', 'CreatedByTypeManagedIdentity', 'CreatedByTypeKey'.

columns.name: extension_properties
columns.description: Gets or sets extensionProperties of the maintenanceConfiguration.

columns.name: system_data
columns.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.
